Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF'' feat: Ansible Documentation Integration v1.10.0 - Web scraping from docs.ansible.com Backend: - New ansible_collections_service.py: Web scraping from docs.ansible.com - Parse namespaces from collections index page (54 namespaces detected) - Parse collections per namespace with lazy loading - Parse modules per collection - Parse module parameter schemas from HTML - New ansible_versions_service.py: Dynamic version detection - Scrape available versions from Ansible docs - URL validation for documentation pages - 24h cache with fallback - New API endpoints /api/ansible/*: - GET /versions - Available Ansible versions - GET /{version}/namespaces - All namespaces (54 for Ansible 13) - GET /{version}/namespaces/{ns}/collections - Dynamic collections - GET /{version}/namespaces/{ns}/collections/{c}/modules - Modules - GET /{version}/namespaces/{ns}/collections/{c}/modules/{m}/schema - Parameters Frontend: - New ansibleApiService.ts: Interface with /api/ansible/* endpoints - New useAnsibleVersions hook: Version state management - VersionSelector in AppHeader: Centralized Ansible version selection - ModulesZoneCached.tsx: DOM nesting fixes - Fix

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Cache management system v1.10.0_15

Backend:
- New cache_scheduler_service.py: Automatic sync every 24h
  - Background scheduler with configurable interval
  - Notification callbacks for SSE broadcasting
  - Manual sync trigger endpoint
- New sse_manager.py: Server-Sent Events for real-time notifications
  - Client connection management
  - Event broadcasting to all connected clients
  - 30s keepalive pings
- New API endpoints /api/ansible/cache/*:
  - GET /status - Scheduler and SSE status
  - POST /sync - Manual sync trigger
  - GET /notifications - SSE connection endpoint
- Updated main.py: Scheduler startup/shutdown lifecycle

Frontend:
- GalaxyCacheContext.tsx: Cache status management
  - ''refreshing'' -> ''refreshed'' -> ''completed'' state flow
  - Auto-return to ''Cached'' after 5 seconds
- ModulesZoneCached.tsx: Visual cache indicator in Elements panel
  - Cached (green) / Refreshing (blue) / Refreshed (green) / Error (red)
  - Icons: SaveIcon / Spinner / CheckCircle / Error
- AppHeader.tsx: Ctrl+Click on logo for force refresh
- notificationService.ts: Updated to use /api/ansible/cache/notifications
- useAnsibleVersions.ts: Shared state via AnsibleVersionContext

Bug fixes (_13 to _15):
- Version change now triggers namespace/collection refresh
- Fixed useAnsibleVersions hook to share state across components
- SSE ping notifications no longer flood console

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: Major cleanup v1.10.0_16 - Remove obsolete Galaxy code

Frontend (7 files deleted, ~2500 lines):
- Remove galaxyService.ts, galaxyCacheService.ts, galaxySmartService.ts
- Remove GalaxyContext.tsx (replaced by GalaxyCacheContext)
- Remove ModulesZone.tsx, OptimizedModulesZone.tsx (keep ModulesZoneCached)
- Update imports to use ansibleApiService
- Add Namespace, Collection, Module types to ansibleApiService

Backend (10 files deleted, ~3000 lines):
- Remove galaxy_service.py and all variants (optimized, simple, hybrid, smart)
- Remove galaxy_cache_service.py, cache_storage_service.py
- Remove notification_service.py (replaced by sse_manager)
- Remove galaxy.py, galaxy_cache.py endpoints
- Update router.py to remove /api/galaxy/* routes
- Clean up main.py imports

Architecture:
- Single API entry point: /api/ansible/*
- Legacy /api/galaxy/* endpoints removed
- ~5500 lines of code removed total
- Simplified, maintainable codebase

Phase 2 validated on staging (192.168.1.217)

ü§ñ Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
